mainHero.title: Prem Milan
mainHero.subtitle: Where LoveÂ Begins!
mainHero.description: At Prem Milan, we are dedicated to helping you find your perfect life partner. With a focus on Hindu marriages in India, our platform is designed to make your search for love easy, efficient, and enjoyable. Whether you're looking for a traditional match or something modern, we cater to all preferences.

items.title: Who We Are!
items.description: Prem Milan is dedicated to uniting hearts and building everlasting relationships. Specializing in Hindu marriages, our platform is designed to provide you with a seamless and efficient matchmaking experience.

items.title: Our Mission!
items.description: Our mission is to bring together individuals seeking meaningful and lasting relationships. We strive to offer a secure, user-friendly, and effective platform where you can find your ideal partner.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: How It Works
features.description: Finding your perfect match is simple and straightforward with Prem Milan. Follow these easy steps to start your journey towards a beautiful relationship.

items.name: Sign Up
items.description: Create your profile and provide us with your preferences.

items.name: Browse Profiles
items.description: Use our search filters to find potential matches.

items.name: Connect
items.description: View contact details and initiate conversations with your matches.

items.name: Personalized Support
items.description: Receive guidance and support from our dedicated team.

features: Exclusive invites to Prem Milan events

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
